```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(waffle)
```


```{r}
spiders <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-12-07/spiders.csv')
```

```{r}
spiders |> 
  mutate(fifty = case_when(
    year > 1750 & year <= 1800 ~ "1750s",
    year > 1800 & year <= 1850 ~ "1800s",
    year > 1850 & year <= 1900 ~ "1850s",
    year > 1900 & year <= 1950 ~ "1950s",
    year > 1950 & year <= 2000 ~ "2000s",
  )) |> 
  count(family, fifty) -> dt_spider
```
